thread.title: Watch: SEVENTEEN Re-enacts K-Dramas In Previews For “SEVENTEEN’s One Fine Day In Japan”
thread.title_full: Watch: SEVENTEEN Re-enacts K-Dramas In Previews For “SEVENTEEN’s One Fine Day In Japan”

author: christinaoh21
title: Watch: SEVENTEEN Re-enacts K-Dramas In Previews For “SEVENTEEN’s One Fine Day In Japan”
text:
Shares 156 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
In February, it was confirmed that SEVENTEEN would be appearing on MBC Music’s “One Fine Day,” making them the first group to appear twice on the program since its start in 2013. The group filmed their episodes in Japan while they were there for their tour.   
MBC Music has since released three teasers for the show, which are creating anticipation for the group’s second season of “One Fine Day.” 
The first teaser shows the members playfully rolling around in the snow, very clearly enjoying filming for the program. The second teaser shows Mingyu and Jeonghan re-enacting common scenes from daytime K-dramas and not being able to hold back their laughter. The final teaser shows the members re-enacting a period drama in which Wonwoo is king. 
The show will begin airing on March 31 at 7 p.m. KST on MBC Music and MBC every1. 
Meanwhile, while they were in Japan, the members of SEVENTEEN became the first Korean celebrities to ever be featured on Instagram’s official Instagram account. 
Check out the previews for “SEVENTEEN’s One Fine Day in Japan” below! 어멋날 최초 두번째 여행! 세븐틴이 눈밭에서 노는 방법☃️ 
— 세븐틴의 어느 멋진 날in JAPAN (@mbcmusic_13boys) March 17, 2017 티저#2 민규&정한의 치명적인 아침드라마! 세상에 이런 막장 전개는 없었다 
— 세븐틴의 어느 멋진 날in JAPAN (@mbcmusic_13boys) March 20, 2017 티저#3 세븐틴의 대하 사극<어느 멋진 날이로다> 역사에 이런 리얼리티는 없었다
